title: Chelsea interested in signing Edin Dzeko from Roma
description: Chelsea are interested in signing former Manchester City striker Edin Dzeko from Roma, according to Sky Italy.
content: They say Chelsea are prepared to pay €50m for Dzeko and his team-mate Emerson Palmieri, who plays left-back.Chelsea would let Roma have Michy Batshuayi on loan as part of the deal but the Italians are also asking for another €15m.Dzeko moved to the Italian capital from Manchester City in August 2015.The 31-year-old has scored 12 goals for Roma this season, including a double against Chelsea at Stamford Bridge in the Champions League in their 3-3 draw in October.He won two Premier League titles, the FA Cup and the League Cup during his spell with Manchester City.
